This seems to be installed the same way as it's counterpart Farming Simulator, which means once a patch comes out follow these instructions;

1. Open RegEdit and use the find tool to find DemolitionCompanyDE_is1 once you have found this rename it to DemolitionCompanyEN_is1, save and close RegEdit

2. Download the english version patch and install it

3. Run the Game.

Hopefully this still works when a patch is released.

Demolition Company Installation Guide

1. Burn or Mount DemolitionCompany ISO.
2. Install Demolition Company.
3. Start Demolition Company, when prompted for the Serial Key, enter: 8QY3J-CPQ7Q-PM2ET-ALL83-FENMQ
4. Finished, have fun playing Demolition Company.

Notes: The game is in German, luckily it isn't a very text based game, but you may have to do some guessing work if you aren't fluent in German. To run this game, you will need to Mount the DemolitionCompany ISO every time you wish to play.

Alright, I got the solution for this problem:

This is a single bin file. It is useless without a cue file. There you need a program to convert the bin file to an iso file. Here you can get it:

http://www.weethet.nl/english/cdrw_bintoiso.php

An iso file can be burned with Nero, or with the Windows 7 built in burner directly.

The key is:
8QY3J-CPQ7Q-PM2ET-ALL83-FENMQ
or insted of going through all that effort just change the bin film with 'ISO.' and there u have it
